duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide project coordination and planning support for clients and Aurrera Health Group leadership.
Conduct policy analysis, contribute to work products, and participate in stakeholder engagement efforts.
Lead client-facing work including weekly project calls with clients and manage project milestones and due dates.
Proactively identify client issues to department leadership and address client needs.
Maintain strong client relationships and communicate internally and with clients about project status.
Work across multiple projects simultaneously and research and draft complex policy papers and other written materials.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in public policy, public health, social work, or a related discipline preferred
